display.title: Better Batteries
description: &&bMV&&r Batteries will be convenient to buffer Energy, just like &&7LV&&r.
The cost in &&aSodium&&r, &&aLithium&&r or &&aCadmium&&r jumps up to 8 dusts, so you may use whatever you have the most of.
The difference in capacity is not that huge after all.
Get &&eeither&&r Battery to complete the Quest.
